PathMNIST.description: PathMNIST: A dataset based on a prior study for predicting survival from colorectal cancer histology slides, which provides a dataset NCT-CRC-HE-100K of 100,000 non-overlapping image patches from hematoxylin & eosin stained histological images, and a test dataset CRC-VAL-HE-7K of 7,180 image patches from a different clinical center. 9 types of tissues are involved, resulting a multi-class classification task. We resize the source images of 3 x 224 x 224 into 3 x 28 x 28, and split NCT-CRC-HE-100K into training and valiation set with a ratio of 9:1.
